vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for scrap tire removal from the Trinity River and removal of trash and debris from creeks, channels, vacant lots, and Lake Ray Hubbard for the Water Utilities Department - Good Earth Corporation, lowest responsible bidder of two - Estimated amount of $2,620,000 - Financing:  Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($2,500,000) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($120,000)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for scrap tire removal from the Trinity River and removal of trash and debris from creeks, channels, vacant lots, and Lake Ray Hubbard for the Water Utilities Department - Good Earth Corporation, lowest responsible bidder of two - Estimated amount of $2,620,000 - Financing:  Stormwater Drainage Management Fund ($2,500,000) and Dallas Water Utilities Fund ($120,000)
